channel.title: Compile and enviorment variable help please!

item.title: Compile and enviorment variable help please!
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

K compiler was working but suddenly it doesnt work. It says path cannot be rec. i check god of iks thread and i put new variables in and stuff but still doesnt work here is the info i have:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;

bottom
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%

compile

@echo off
title Pimpscape Compiler
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_03/bin/javac” *.java
pause

please tell me wats wrong i need to update !!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2008, 08:09:00 PM[/size][hr]nobody knows at least tell me how i find exactly what java im using so i can make sure im not doin somtein wrong.
